TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EndpointIdentity extends System.Object

summary.span: 實作時會提供身分識別的抽象類別，這個身分識別可讓與端點交換訊息的用戶端驗證端點。

span.span: An abstract class that when implemented provides an identity that enables the authentication of an endpoint by clients that exchange messages with it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 端點的身分識別值可以用 的建構函式設定，此時其值也可以當做唯讀的 屬性存取。The value of the identity for an endpoint can be set with constructors of , where its value can also be accessed as a read-only property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連接至使用這個身分識別端點的安全 WCF 用戶端會確認伺服器提供的宣告，包含表示此身分識別的 DNS 宣告。A secure WCF client that connects to an endpoint with this identity verifies that the claims presented by the server contain a DNS claim that represents this identity. 這個靜態方法會呼叫其建構函式 ，藉此建立 的執行個體。This static method creates an instance of by calling its constructor . ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何呼叫這個方法。The following code shows how to call this method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個身分識別連接至端點的安全 WCF 用戶端，將確認伺服器提供的宣告是否包含用來建構這個身分識別之 RSA 公開金鑰的宣告。A secure WCF client that connects to an endpoint with this identity verifies that the claims presented by the server contain a claim that contains the RSA public key used to construct this identity. 這些靜態方法的其中一個方法會呼叫其建構函式 ，藉此建立 的執行個體。One of these static methods creates an instance of by calling its constructor .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity CreateSpnIdentity(string spnName) cil managed
Public Shared Function CreateSpnIdentity (spnName As String) As EndpointIdentity

span.span: The name for the SPN identity.

summary.span: 使用指定的名稱建立伺服器主要名稱 (SPN) 身分識別。

span.span: Creates a server principal name (SPN) identity with a specified name.

returns.span: 與指定之 相關聯的 SPN 。

span.span: An SPN associated with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對端點進行 SSPI 驗證時，連接至使用這個身分識別端點的安全 WCF 用戶端會使用 SPN。A secure WCF client that connects to an endpoint with this identity uses the SPN when performing SSPI authentication with the endpoint. 這個靜態方法會使用 做為輸入參數來呼叫其建構函式 ，藉此建立 `spnName` 的執行個體。This static method creates an instance of by calling its constructor, , using `spnName` as the input parameter. 如果是以空字串指定 `spnName`，則驗證程序會盡可能從 Kerberos 退回使用 NTLM。If `spnName` is specified with an empty string, authentication falls back from Kerberos to NTLM if possible. 如果 為 `false`，驗證就會失敗。If is `false`, authentication fails. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何呼叫這個方法。The following code shows how to call this method. [!code-csharp[S_UEEndpointIdentity#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueendpointidentity/cs/source.cs#12)]

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.ServiceModel.EndpointIdentity CreateUpnIdentity(string upnName) cil managed
Public Shared Function CreateUpnIdentity (upnName As String) As EndpointIdentity

span.span: The name for the UPN identity.

summary.span: 使用指定的名稱建立使用者主要名稱 (UPN) 身分識別。

span.span: Creates a user principal name (UPN) identity with a specified name.

returns.span: 與指定之 相關聯的 UPN 。

span.span: A UPN associated with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對端點進行 SSPI 驗證時，連接至使用這個身分識別端點的安全 WCF 用戶端會使用 UPN。A secure WCF client that connects to an endpoint with this identity uses the UPN when performing SSPI authentication with the endpoint. 這個靜態方法會使用 做為輸入參數來呼叫其建構函式 ，藉此建立 `upnName` 的執行個體。This static method creates an instance of by calling its constructor, , using `upnName` as the input parameter. 如果是以空字串指定 `upnName`，則驗證程序會盡可能從 Kerberos 退回使用 NTLM。If `upnName` is specified with an empty string, authentication falls back from Kerberos to NTLM if possible. 如果是`false`，WCF 會盡力擲回例外狀況，如果使用 NTLM。If is `false`, WCF makes a best-effort to throw an exception if NTLM is used. 請注意，將此屬性設為 `false`，不一定能夠禁止 NTLM 認證透過網路傳送。Note that setting this property to `false` may not prevent NTLM credentials from being sent over the wire. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何呼叫這個方法。The following code shows how to call this method. [!code-csharp[S_UEEndpointIdentity#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueendpointidentity/cs/source.cs#30)]

span.span: is .

summary.span: 建立 X509Certificate 身分識別。

span.span: Creates an X509Certificate identity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可根據是否有支援的憑證，選擇使用兩個建構函式的其中一個。Choose between these two constructors based on whether you have supporting certificates. 使用這個身分識別連線至端點的安全 WCF 用戶端，會確認伺服器提供的宣告是否包含用來建構這個身分識別之憑證指紋的宣告。A secure WCF client that connects to an endpoint with this identity verifies that the claims presented by the server contain the claim that contains the thumbprint of the certificate used to construct this identity.
